0.name: Corkage Fee
0.fullDesc: Deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Gallagher's ATK to a single target enemy.
0.shortDesc: Deals minor Fire DMG to a single enemy.

1.name: Nectar Blitz
1.fullDesc: Deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Gallagher's ATK to a single target enemy. Reduces the target's ATK by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[f1]%</unbreak></color>, lasting for <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> turn(s).
1.shortDesc: Deals Fire DMG to a single enemy and reduces ATK.

0.name: Special Brew
0.fullDesc: Immediately heals a target ally for <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak></color> HP.

0.name: Champagne Etiquette
0.fullDesc: Inflicts Besotted on all enemies, lasting for <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> turn(s). At the same time, deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Gallagher's ATK to all enemies, and enhances this unit's next Basic ATK to Nectar Blitz.
0.shortDesc: <color=#f29e38ff>Inflicts Besotted</color> on all enemies and deals Fire DMG to them at the same time. Enhances this unit's next Basic ATK to Nectar Blitz.

0.name: Artisan Elixir
0.fullDesc: Immediately attacks the enemy. Upon entering battle, inflicts Besotted on all enemies, lasting for <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> turn(s). And deals Fire DMG equal to <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> of Gallagher's ATK to all enemies.
0.shortDesc: Attacks the enemy. After entering battle, <color=#f29e38ff>inflicts Besotted</color> to all enemies and deals minor Fire DMG to all enemies.

0.name: Attack
0.fullDesc: Attacks an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.
